title: Topic 05 Question 22
body: You are developing an ASP.NET Core Web API web service. The web service uses Azure Application Insights for all telemetry and dependency tracking. The web service reads and writes data to a database other than Microsoft SQL Server.
You need to ensure that dependency tracking works for calls to the third-party database.
Which two dependency telemetry properties should you use? Each correct answer presents part of the solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
